setUseCache

public void setUseCache(boolean useCache)
Description copied from interface: QueryFilter
Set this property to inform caching Datasets that a search using this QueryFilter should/should not use the cache. If the cache is not used, then a search will block it while the Dataset contacts the external dataset.

Specified by:
setUseCache in interface QueryFilter
Parameters:
useCache - a boolean variable - True, if cache can be used, else False
See Also:
QueryFilter.getUseCache()

getUseCache

public boolean getUseCache()
Description copied from interface: QueryFilter
Determines if the Searchable Dataset should examine cached data. Datasets that do not support data caching will ignore this property.

Specified by:
getUseCache in interface QueryFilter
Returns:
a boolean variable - True, if cached data should be examined, else False

reconstructWhereClause

public static final String reconstructWhereClause(String where,
                                                  Fields fields)
                                           throws QCompileException,
                                                  QSyntaxException
Reconstructs the given where clause for use with software that requires a US English locale version of a where clause. This method assumes that the current default Locale is the Locale in which the where clause was constructed. If the current locale is US English then the original where clause is returned unchanged.

Parameters:
where - the where clause to be reconstructed
fields - the fields
Returns:
the reconstructed where clause
Throws:
QCompileException
QSyntaxException

reconstructWhereClause

public static final String reconstructWhereClause(String where,
                                                  Fields fields,
                                                  boolean useInternalNames)
                                           throws QCompileException,
                                                  QSyntaxException
Reconstructs the given where clause in US English local and supports use of Field InternalNames instead of the Field Names.

Parameters:
where - the where clause
fields - the fields
useInternalNames - True == use the Field InternalNames, False == use the Field Names
QCompileException
QSyntaxException
See Also:
reconstructWhereClause(String,Fields)
